0.MAIN_EXP:
Yakuza 4 includes various network services that
can be enjoyed for free by simply connecting to
PlayStationNetwork.
1. Extras
2. Online Ranking Mode
3. Dynamic Ads

~Broadband connection is required.
0.MAIN_EXP2:
~Items 2 and 3 also require you to sign in to a
PlayStationNetwork account.

For more information on PlayStationNetwork,
refer to your PlayStation4 manual, or
visit the site below.

http://us.playstation.com/psn/
0.MAIN_EXP3:
About Extras (1)
Yakuza 4 will have regular updates packed with
extras like the following:

- Special Games
- Item Packs
- Character Costume
0.MAIN_EXP4:
About Extras (2)

If your PlayStation4 is connected to the
Internet, it will automatically update itself
when you boot up Yakuza 4.
If the update fails due to connectivity issues,
go to "Network" from the Main Menu and select  "Manual Update."
0.MAIN_EXP5:
About Online Ranking Mode (1)
Playing the following games in Yakuza 4 will
enter you into rankings with other users.
1. Boxcelios           (Club SEGA)
2. Boxcelios 2         (Club SEGA)
3. Darts               (Bantam)
4. Batting             (Yoshida Batting Cage)
5. Bowling             (Mach Bowl)
6. Table Tennis        (Yunosono Hot Springs)
0.MAIN_EXP6:
About Online Ranking Mode (2)

Visit Naomi's Palace on Tenkaichi Street to
access special games not playable elsewhere.
These games also have rankings.

Note: You will need to fulfill certain conditions
before you can unlock them.
For more details, check out Naomi's Palace.
0.MAIN_EXP7:
About Dynamic Ads

Dynamic Ads use your Internet connection to
update signs and posters around Kamurocho
with advertisements of real world products,
bringing the city to life with enhanced realism.
Signing in to the PlayStationNetwork
will keep your Kamurocho up to date.
0.MAIN_EXP8:
Visit the official website for content release
dates and other information:



http://ryu-ga-gotoku.com/

1.CONTENTS_EXP: Select "SPECIAL GAMES" from the Title Menu to play.

2.CONTENTS: "Pure Love in Kamurocho" by Akiyama & Hana (Epilogue Ver.)
2.CONTENTS_EXP: Select "SPECIAL GAMES" from the Title Menu to play.

3.CONTENTS_EXP:
New costume for Akiyama added. Available only
in Premium Adventure mode.
3.MAIN_EXP:
Akiyama: Made It Big

Available only in Premium Adventure mode.
Costumes can be changed at hideouts.

4.CONTENTS_EXP:
New costume for Saejima added. Available only
in Premium Adventure mode.
4.MAIN_EXP:
Saejima: Taiga Mask

Available only in Premium Adventure mode.
Costumes can be changed at hideouts.

5.CONTENTS_EXP:
New costume for Tanimura added. Available only
in Premium Adventure mode.
5.MAIN_EXP:
Tanimura: Kung Fu II

Available only in Premium Adventure mode.
Costumes can be changed at hideouts.

6.CONTENTS_EXP:
New costume for Kiryu added. Available only

6.MAIN_EXP:
Kiryu: Dragon Mask

Available only in Premium Adventure.
Costumes can be changed inside hideouts.

7.CONTENTS_EXP:
New costume for Haruka added. Available only
in Premium Adventure mode.
7.MAIN_EXP:
Haruka: Junior Cheerleader

Available only in Premium Adventure.
Costumes can be changed inside hideouts.

8.CONTENTS: Underground Coliseum SP Battle King Championship
8.CONTENTS_EXP:
Extra game mode added. Play it by visiting
Naomi's Palace in Premium Adventure after beating
the game.
8.MSG_WINDOW:
You can play this game by going to Naomi's
Palace on Tenkaichi Street. Follow your map
to get there.
8.MAIN_EXP:
縲- Who Will Be the Battle King!? -

Bring down foes in the Underground Coliseum one
after another, vying for the top. Fight in separate
challenges for each of the four main characters.
But once you're knocked out, you're out!

Supports Online Ranking mode! Fight!
Who will become the supreme Battle King?

9.CONTENTS_EXP:
Extra game mode added. Play it by visiting
Naomi's Palace in Premium Adventure after beating
the game.
9.MSG_WINDOW:
You can play this game by going to Naomi's
Palace on Tenkaichi Street. Follow your map
to get there.
9.MAIN_EXP:
- It's Back With a Vengeance! -
It took Kamurocho by storm in 2009. Now the
beloved "Survival Tag" mode is back and better
than ever with brand-new missions. Escape from
the clutches of Bob Utsunomiya in a high-risk,
high-return, heart-pounding struggle! Comes with
a new "Endless" mode that supports Online
Ranking mode! Be the ultimate survivor!

10.CONTENTS: Underground Parking Lot Speed King Championship
10.CONTENTS_EXP:
Extra game mode added. Play it by visiting
Naomi's Palace in Premium Adventure after beating
the game.
10.MSG_WINDOW:
You can play this game by going to Naomi's
Palace on Tenkaichi Street. Follow your map
to get there.
10.MAIN_EXP:
縲- The True Speed King Shall Be Crowned -

Run three laps around the Kamurocho Central Parking
Lot course as fast as you can! A truly worthy
battleground for a truly epic battle. Who will
become the true Kamurocho Speed King?

11.CONTENTS_EXP:
EX-SSS has been added as a Mood rank for
Haruka. This rank is only available in Premium
Adventure mode.
